content: 富裕就是快乐和自由。
translation: Abundance is happiness and freedom.

content: 我使自己的身、心、灵都很健康。
translation: I keep my body, mind, and spirit healthy.

content: 身体是我亲密的朋友。
translation: My body is my intimate friend.

content: 我的身体是强壮的，它会疗愈自己。
translation: My body is strong; it heals itself.

content: 我用放松自如的爱来祝福自己。
translation: I bless myself with relaxed and effortless love.

content: 我家很美。我让每个房间都充满爱与喜悦。
translation: My home is beautiful. I fill every room with love and joy.

content: 这世界是个丰富的地方。
translation: This world is a place of abundance.

content: 我欢迎丰盈进入我的生命。
translation: I welcome abundance into my life.

content: 无论我到何处，我总是被保护也被爱。
translation: Wherever I go, I am protected and loved.

content: 我怀着感谢与爱的心情来付自己的账单。
translation: I pay my bills with gratitude and love.

content: 我对体内那不可思议的能力感到赞叹。
translation: I am in awe of the incredible abilities within my body.

content: 有了钱，我想创造生活中最美好的事物。
translation: With money, I want to create the best things in life.

content: 我在成人生活里创造稳定，使得我的内在小孩感到安全。
translation: I create stability in my adult life, making my inner child feel safe.

content: 我怀着爱与感恩的心情来照顾我的身体。
translation: I take care of my body with love and gratitude.

content: 每件事情都很顺遂，目前情况正是如此。
translation: Everything is going smoothly, and this is the current situation.

content: 每天早晨我醒来，都喜悦地期待这一天会带给我的礼物。
translation: Every morning I wake up, I joyfully anticipate the gifts this day will bring.

content: 我身体的每个细胞都充满了无限的喜悦能量。
translation: Every cell in my body is filled with infinite joyful energy.

content: 我很高兴有好朋友的陪伴。
translation: I am happy to have the company of good friends.

content: 我喜悦的活在当下。
translation: I joyfully live in the present moment.

content: 我的心洋溢着喜悦，因为我的生活中充满了美好的祝福。
translation: My heart overflows with joy because my life is full of wonderful blessings.

content: 我爱我独一无二而且美好的生活。
translation: I love my unique and beautiful life.

content: 我很容易适应我周遭的人、地方和事物。
translation: I easily adapt to the people, places, and things around me.

content: 我自由地、带着爱去创造那些使我生活更丰富、更美好的事物。
translation: I freely and lovingly create things that enrich and beautify my life.

content: 当下每件事物都是活力充沛的。(那天玩着抽到了这个，可能是对我的提醒吧，活力一点，不要死气沉沉，暮气横秋的，好好调整自己吧。)
translation: Everything is vibrant at this moment. (That day I drew this card, it might be a reminder to myself: be more lively, don’t be lifeless or old-fashioned, adjust yourself properly.)

content: 每个人都值得拥有快乐且充实的生活。
translation: Everyone deserves a happy and fulfilling life.

content: 你可以在意想不到的地方找到喜悦。
translation: You can find joy in unexpected places.

content: 每一天都是特别的也是珍贵的，因为我只能拥有一次。
translation: Each day is special and precious because I can only experience it once.

content: 今天我允许自己玩得很开心、很尽兴。
translation: Today I allow myself to have fun and enjoy to the fullest.

content: 我随处都看见旺盛的生命能量。
translation: I see vibrant life energy everywhere.

content: 我喜悦的敞开心胸来接受生命中快乐的转变。
translation: I joyfully open my heart to accept joyful changes in life.

content: 我们每个人都以有意义的方式，来享受宇宙间的财富与丰盈。
translation: Each of us enjoys the wealth and abundance of the universe in a meaningful way.

content: 凭借肯定生命并呈现活在其中的喜悦，我的爱、力量与智慧增长。
translation: By affirming life and expressing the joy of living in it, my love, strength, and wisdom grow.

content: 今天我盛宴款待自己因此整天都容光焕发。
translation: Today I feast myself, so I shine all day long.

content: 微不足道地日常事物也能使我充满快乐与平静。
translation: Even trivial daily things can fill me with happiness and peace.

content: 我的内在小孩教我如何放松并享受生命。
translation: My inner child teaches me how to relax and enjoy life.

content: 当我带着爱去关心身体，我逐渐了解身体所传达出的隐秘愿望。
translation: When I care for my body with love, I gradually understand the hidden desires it conveys.

content: 生命是美好的，我极尽所能地反馈我所接受的所有美善。
translation: Life is wonderful, and I do my best to give back all the goodness I receive.

content: 我很平安，而且一切都很顺利。
translation: I am at peace, and everything is going smoothly.

content: 我是个独一无二的个体，我的使命会在日常生活中实现。
translation: I am a unique individual, and my mission is realized in daily life.

content: 只要我信任我自己就可以面对任何情况。
translation: As long as I trust myself, I can face any situation.

content: 我很棒，我目前正是如此。
translation: I am great, and this is how I am now.

content: 我身处绝对安全之中。
translation: I am in absolute safety.

content: 绝对的静谧，常驻我心。
translation: Absolute tranquility resides in my heart.

content: 我知道我很有力量，并且用不同的方式来使用它们。
translation: I know I have great power, and I use it in different ways.

content: 我知道真实的需要和匮乏感之间的区别。
translation: I know the difference between true needs and feelings of scarcity.

content: 在我的生命中，我就是发光的太阳。
translation: In my life, I am the shining sun.

content: 我是一个很棒的、发光的并且充满神性的个体。
translation: I am a wonderful, shining, and divine individual.

content: 我欢迎所有令我快乐的事情。
translation: I welcome all things that make me happy.

content: 我渴望正向的改变，因此我接纳目前的自己。
translation: I desire positive changes, so I accept myself as I am now.

content: 我肯定我自己。
translation: I affirm myself.

content: 我面对的终究只有自己。
translation: Ultimately, I face only myself.

content: 我活在当下。
translation: I live in the present.

content: 我总是得到天时、地利、人和之便。
translation: I always receive the benefits of right timing, favorable location, and harmonious people.

content: 我看到自己和每个人的美善。
translation: I see the goodness in myself and everyone.

content: 我肯定并了解自己内在的美。
translation: I affirm and understand my inner beauty.

content: 我对我的生命负责。
translation: I take responsibility for my life.

content: 我有力量和能力去过有意义的生活。
translation: I have the power and ability to live a meaningful life.

content: 我愿意面对生命的改变。
translation: I am willing to face the changes in life.

content: 我知道我值得拥有美好的生活。
translation: I know I deserve a wonderful life.

content: 只有我能够使自己真正快乐。
translation: Only I can make myself truly happy.

content: 我知道我是所有爱的源头。
translation: I know I am the source of all love.

content: 我是真理，我是生命，我跟宇宙万物合一。
translation: I am truth, I am life, I am one with the universe.

content: 我是独一无二的，而别人也是如此。
translation: I am unique, and so is everyone else.

content: 我就是我，我很好。
translation: I am who I am, and I am fine.

content: 我是有价值的，也是受欢迎的，我目前就是如此。
translation: I am valuable and welcome, and this is how I am now.

content: 我可以感受我的情绪而不觉得受到伤害。
translation: I can feel my emotions without feeling hurt.

content: 无论我的伙伴是否认同我，我都觉得安全。
translation: Whether my partners agree with me or not, I feel safe.

content: 我不再认同自己创造出来的恐惧。
translation: I no longer identify with the fears I have created.

content: 我以爱的眼光来看我的伙伴。
translation: I see my partner with eyes of love.

content: 当我学着发展自重和自爱的时候，我对自己更有耐心。
translation: As I learn to develop self-respect and self-love, I become more patient with myself.

content: 我一直在寻找的宝藏就在我心中。
translation: The treasure I've been seeking is within my heart.

content: 我在周围人们的眼里，找到神的爱。
translation: I find divine love in the eyes of people around me.

content: 我结合爱与光，因而创造了一个崭新的世界。
translation: By combining love and light, I create a new world.

content: 由于我体验到内在的爱与平静，所以我也愿意给出爱与平静。
translation: Having experienced inner love and peace, I am willing to give love and peace to others.

content: 我爱自己并且喜欢以伟大神里的方式来过日子。
translation: I love myself and enjoy living in the divine way.

content: 现在我愿意自由地、公开地付出爱也接受爱。
translation: Now I am willing to freely and openly give and receive love.

content: 因为我选择爱的想法，所以我感觉身处在充满了爱的环境。
translation: Because I choose thoughts of love, I feel surrounded by a loving environment.

content: 我爱他所以在他面前我毫无不隐瞒，呈现真实的自己。这是我感谢他的原因。
translation: I love him, so I show my true self without concealment. That's why I appreciate him.

content: 我喜欢学习成长和改变。
translation: I enjoy learning, growing, and changing.

content: 我了解每个人都想得到爱。
translation: I understand that everyone desires love.

content: 在我心中充满了无限的爱。
translation: My heart is filled with infinite love.

content: 当我把愤怒的能量转变成爱的疗愈能量时，就会产生美好的转变。
translation: When I transform angry energy into healing energy of love, beautiful changes occur.

content: 被爱是美好的。
translation: Being loved is wonderful.

content: 真爱里面没有憎恨。
translation: There is no hatred in true love.

content: 爱自己始于宽恕自己。
translation: Loving oneself begins with forgiving oneself.

content: 每天我都更爱我自己。
translation: Each day I love myself more.

content: 我由衷地接纳每件事，那都是我的一部分。
translation: I wholeheartedly accept everything as part of myself.

content: 就我的伙伴而言，我是可爱的;就我而言，他也是可爱的。
translation: To my partner, I am lovable; to me, he is lovable.

content: 任何我希望在伙伴身上出现的特质，都可以在我的内心找到。
translation: Any quality I wish to see in my partner can be found within my own heart.

content: 我让爱流入我的世界祝福每个人和每件事。
translation: I let love flow into my world, blessing everyone and everything.

content: 我喜欢逐步地认识新朋友。
translation: I enjoy gradually getting to know new friends.

content: 被爱是世界上最轻易的事情，因为那是我真实的本性。
translation: Being loved is the easiest thing in the world because it is my true nature.

content: 我心中充满着爱来迎接每个崭新的日子。
translation: I greet each new day with a heart full of love.

content: 我的目标是去爱每一个生命片刻。
translation: My goal is to love every moment of life.

content: 我放下所有的期待并且敞开心胸去体验差异带给我的丰盈。
translation: I release all expectations and open my heart to experience the abundance that differences bring me.

content: 我让爱布满全身并推及他人。
translation: I let love fill my entire being and extend to others.

content: 我用爱和关心的想法来滋润自己。
translation: I nourish myself with thoughts of love and care.

content: 无论对自己或别人，我都选择爱的想法。
translation: Whether for myself or others, I choose loving thoughts.

content: 我敞开心胸来迎接生命中的爱与丰盈。
translation: I open my heart to welcome love and abundance in life.

content: 今天我的能量是发光且平和。我可以用建设性的方式来表达我的愤怒。
translation: Today my energy is radiant and peaceful. I can express my anger in constructive ways.

content: 在人际关系中，我能在亲密和自由之间取得平衡。
translation: In relationships, I balance intimacy and freedom.

content: 凭借清楚且带着爱的行为，我拥有清楚且带着爱的经验。
translation: Through clear and loving actions, I gain clear and loving experiences.

content: 我的任务就是以自己的方式来过日子。
translation: My task is to live life in my own way.

content: 我把工作做得很好，并受到每个人的肯定与赞美。
translation: I do my work well, receiving recognition and praise from everyone.

content: 我知道把界线设在什么地方，并在必要的时候说"不"。
translation: I know where to set boundaries and can say "no" when necessary.

content: 活在当下使我充满力量。
translation: Living in the present moment empowers me.

content: 我给自己自由去拥有崭新且发光的经验。
translation: I give myself freedom to have new and radiant experiences.

content: 当我请求别人协助的时候，我依然值得被爱。
translation: When I ask for help, I am still worthy of love.

content: 我的工作是理想的，并带给我乐趣。
translation: My work is ideal and brings me joy.

content: 我带着信心和爱去接近别人。
translation: I approach others with confidence and love.

content: 我放下我的期待。
translation: I release my expectations.

content: 今天我有足够的时间去做任何需要做的事情。
translation: Today I have enough time to do everything needed.

content: 我可以自由自在地去任何地方旅行。
translation: I can travel freely to any place.

content: 我的生命是有深度，有规律，并且放松的。
translation: My life has depth, rhythm, and relaxation.

content: 我观察自己的感觉，而非告诉别人他们应该如何感觉。
translation: I observe my own feelings rather than telling others how they should feel.

content: 我有权力也有能力去表达我的暴怒、生气及意见，而不会伤害任何人，也不会失去他们对我的爱。
translation: I have the right and ability to express my rage, anger, and opinions without hurting anyone or losing their love.

content: 我愿意敞开心胸让别人了解我。
translation: I am willing to open my heart for others to understand me.

content: 现在我选择活得神采奕奕。
translation: Now I choose to live vibrantly.

content: 我带着信心和爱去接近别人。
translation: I approach others with confidence and love.

content: 我放下我的期待。
translation: I release my expectations.

content: 今天我有足够的时间去做任何需要做的事情。
translation: Today I have enough time to do anything needed.

content: 我可以自由自在地去任何地方旅行。
translation: I can travel freely to any place.

content: 我的生命是有深度，有规律，并且放松的。
translation: My life has depth, rhythm, and relaxation.

content: 我观察自己的感觉，而非告诉别人他们应该如何感觉。
translation: I observe my own feelings rather than telling others how they should feel.

content: 我有权力也有能力去表达我的暴怒、生气及意见，而不会伤害任何人，也不会失去他们对我的爱。
translation: I have the right and ability to express my rage, anger, and opinions without hurting anyone or losing their love.

content: 我愿意敞开心胸让别人了解我。
translation: I am willing to open my heart for others to understand me.

content: 现在我选择活得神采奕奕。
translation: Now I choose to live vibrantly.

content: 我活着不是为了满足别人，也不必依照他人的想法来过日子。
translation: I live not to satisfy others, nor by others' ideas.

content: 我关注我的思维，去除那些像杂草般令我痛苦的念头并专注于对我有益的想法。
translation: I focus on my thoughts, removing painful weeds and concentrating on beneficial ideas.

content: 我从经验中学习并认为走不同的路是绝对可行的。
translation: I learn from experience and believe taking different paths is absolutely feasible.

content: 没有所谓的难题，有的只是有限的观点。
translation: There are no unsolvable problems, only limited perspectives.

content: 我不可以活在过去，因为那已经过去了。
translation: I cannot live in the past, for it is gone.

content: 每天在生活中出现的新点子，协助我跟过去和解。
translation: New ideas arising daily help me reconcile with the past.

content: 就在当下，我创造我的未来。
translation: Right now, I create my future.

content: 我欣赏且看重我头脑的明晰和真实。
translation: I appreciate and value the clarity and truth in my mind.

content: 我选择喜悦及和平的想法。
translation: I choose thoughts of joy and peace.

content: 生命太珍贵了，所以我不能让自己迷失在过去的憎恨与痛苦里。
translation: Life is too precious to lose myself in past hatred and pain.

content: 生命就是自我探索的旅程。
translation: Life is a journey of self-discovery.

content: 我敞开心胸接受快乐的解决之道。
translation: I open my heart to joyful solutions.

content: 我信任我的直觉。
translation: I trust my intuition.

content: 我允许恐惧像云一样的来去自如。
translation: I allow fear to come and go like clouds.

content: 我怎么想就会看见什么。
translation: What I think is what I see.

content: 我学习把痛苦当做一个提醒自己去倾听身体智慧的信号。
translation: I learn to treat pain as a signal to listen to my body's wisdom.

content: 我越积极地看待自己以及世界，就越吸引积极的人。
translation: The more positively I view myself and the world, the more I attract positive people.

content: 选择的权力操之在我。
translation: The power of choice lies within me.

content: 即使在工作中，我也准备好与更高的自我接触。
translation: Even at work, I am ready to connect with my higher self.

content: 当我学着了解自己、爱自己的时候，我的神性会引导我。
translation: As I learn to know and love myself, my divinity guides me.

content: 我跟创造我的力量有直接的连系。
translation: I am directly connected to the force that created me.

content: 我放下对生命的抗拒。
translation: I release resistance to life.

content: 我和所有活力充沛的事物合一。
translation: I am one with all vibrant things.

content: 内心的清明思维能疗愈外在的负面标徽。
translation: Inner clarity can heal external negative symbols.

content: 所有我需要知道的事都会有人在适当的时间、适当的地点告诉我。
translation: Everything I need to know will be revealed at the right time and place.

content: 我放下不再属于我的一切敞开心胸接受转变。
translation: I release what no longer belongs to me and open my heart to change.

content: 每天我都拨出时间让自己心情平和，并与内在自我全然合一。
translation: Each day I set aside time for peace and unity with my inner self.

content: 我允许自己活出真实的自己。
translation: I allow myself to live authentically.

content: 我是自由的。
translation: I am free.

content: 我的意识是光明、清楚并且充满爱的。
translation: My consciousness is bright, clear, and filled with love.

content: 我知道我内心经常充满无私的爱，当我需要时，它会回应我。
translation: I know my heart is often filled with selfless love, and it responds when I need it.

content: 在任何情况下，我都是安全的。
translation: In any situation, I am safe.

content: 我愿意把每一件今天发生在我身上的事当做是生命赋予的礼物。
translation: I embrace everything that happens today as a gift from life.
